project_abstract.cdata: The Second Karachi Post Project in Pakistan will assist in financing the present expansion and development project of Karachi Port Trust (KPT). The project is part of Pakistan's second five year plan. The port complex consists of seventeen berths on the East Wharves, four berths on the West Wharves, two bulk oil piers, and various moorings and lighterage facilities, It includes providing additional capacity to cope with present and future traffic, rehabilitation, and reconstruction of existing facilities in the port. The project will assist in the economic development of Pakistan.
